accurate_docstring: The Smart School Attendance Scene starts by activating facial and fingerprint recognition systems. It listens for events such as the detection of a student's face or fingerprint. When facial recognition is detected, the system records the attendance for the student using facial recognition and sends a notification to the management system. Similarly, it records the attendance and sends notifications for fingerprint recognition, ensuring accurate and efficient attendance tracking.
template_docstring: WHEN in the Smart School Attendance Scene, DO activate facial and fingerprint recognition systems; listen for events such as the detection of a student's face or fingerprint; WHEN facial recognition is detected, DO record the attendance for the student using facial recognition; send a notification to the management system; similarly, DO record the attendance and send notifications for fingerprint recognition, ensuring accurate and efficient attendance tracking.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningSchoolRoutine, monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom101. If the occupancy is greater than 30, adjust the HVAC system to increase ventilation. Notify the administration that the morning school maintenance is completed. When in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom102. If the occupancy is less than 15, adjust the HVAC system to reduce ventilation. Notify the administration that the afternoon school maintenance is completed. When in the eveningSchoolRoutine, monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom103. If the occupancy is greater than 25, adjust the HVAC system to increase ventilation. Notify the administration that the evening school maintenance is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom101; IF the occupancy is greater than 30, THEN adjust the HVAC system to increase ventilation; notify the administration that the morning school maintenance is completed; WHEN in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom102; IF the occupancy is less than 15, THEN adjust the HVAC system to reduce ventilation; notify the administration that the afternoon school maintenance is completed; WHEN in the eveningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the classroom occupancy in classroom103; IF the occupancy is greater than 25, THEN adjust the HVAC system to increase ventilation; notify the administration that the evening school maintenance is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningSchoolRoutine, monitor the water quality in classroom 101. If the pH is below 6.5, adjust the water filtration system to increase filtration. Notify maintenance that the morning school maintenance is completed. When in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, monitor the water quality in classroom 102. If contaminants are present, adjust the water filtration system to increase filtration. Notify maintenance that the afternoon school maintenance is completed. When in the eveningSchoolRoutine, monitor the water quality in classroom 103. If the pH is above 8.5, adjust the water filtration system to reduce filtration. Notify maintenance that the evening school maintenance is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the water quality in classroom 101; IF the pH is below 6.5, THEN adjust the water filtration system to increase filtration; notify maintenance that the morning school maintenance is completed; WHEN in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the water quality in classroom 102; IF contaminants are present, THEN adjust the water filtration system to increase filtration; notify maintenance that the afternoon school maintenance is completed; WHEN in the eveningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the water quality in classroom 103; IF the pH is above 8.5, THEN adjust the water filtration system to reduce filtration; notify maintenance that the evening school maintenance is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningSchoolRoutine, monitor the energy consumption in classroom101. If the energy consumption is greater than 10 kWh, turn off the lights. Notify administration that the morning energy management is completed. When in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, monitor the energy consumption in classroom102. If the energy consumption is greater than 15 kWh, turn off the lights. Notify administration that the afternoon energy management is completed. When in the eveningSchoolRoutine, monitor the energy consumption in classroom103. If the energy consumption is greater than 12 kWh, turn off the lights. Notify administration that the evening energy management is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the energy consumption in classroom101; IF the energy consumption is greater than 10 kWh, THEN turn off the lights; notify administration that the morning energy management is completed; WHEN in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the energy consumption in classroom102; IF the energy consumption is greater than 15 kWh, THEN turn off the lights; notify administration that the afternoon energy management is completed; WHEN in the eveningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the energy consumption in classroom103; IF the energy consumption is greater than 12 kWh, THEN turn off the lights; notify administration that the evening energy management is completed.

accurate_docstring: In morningRoutine, track attendance, set the classroom temperature to 22°C, start the digital board, schedule a Math lesson at 09:00 AM, and complete the morning classroom management routine. In afternoonRoutine, track attendance, set the classroom temperature to 24°C, pause the digital board, schedule a Science lesson at 01:00 PM, and complete the afternoon classroom management routine. In eveningRoutine, track attendance, set the classroom temperature to 20°C, stop the digital board, schedule a History lesson at 03:00 PM, and complete the evening classroom management routine.
template_docstring: WHEN in morningRoutine, DO track attendance; set the classroom temperature to 22°C; start the digital board; schedule a Math lesson at 09:00 AM; complete the morning classroom management routine; WHEN in afternoonRoutine, DO track attendance; set the classroom temperature to 24°C; pause the digital board; schedule a Science lesson at 01:00 PM; complete the afternoon classroom management routine; WHEN in eveningRoutine, DO track attendance; set the classroom temperature to 20°C; stop the digital board; schedule a History lesson at 03:00 PM; complete the evening classroom management routine.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningSchoolRoutine, monitor the CO2 levels in classroom101. If the CO2 levels exceed 1000 ppm, increase the ventilation. Monitor the light levels in classroom101. If the light levels are below 300 lux, increase the lighting. Monitor the temperature in classroom101. If the temperature is below 20°C, adjust the HVAC to heating. Notify the administration that the morning school routine is completed. In the afternoonSchoolRoutine, monitor the CO2 levels in classroom102. If the CO2 levels exceed 800 ppm, increase the ventilation. Monitor the light levels in classroom102. If the light levels exceed 700 lux, decrease the lighting. Monitor the temperature in classroom102. If the temperature is above 24°C, adjust the HVAC to cooling. Notify the administration that the afternoon school routine is completed. In the eveningSchoolRoutine, monitor the CO2 levels in classroom103. If the CO2 levels exceed 1200 ppm, increase the ventilation. Monitor the light levels in classroom103. If the light levels are below 200 lux, increase the lighting. Monitor the temperature in classroom103. If the temperature is below 18°C, adjust the HVAC to heating. Notify the administration that the evening school routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the CO2 levels in classroom101; IF the CO2 levels exceed 1000 ppm, THEN increase the ventilation; monitor the light levels in classroom101; IF the light levels are below 300 lux, THEN increase the lighting; monitor the temperature in classroom101; IF the temperature is below 20°C, THEN adjust the HVAC to heating; notify the administration that the morning school routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the CO2 levels in classroom102; IF the CO2 levels exceed 800 ppm, THEN increase the ventilation; monitor the light levels in classroom102; IF the light levels exceed 700 lux, THEN decrease the lighting; monitor the temperature in classroom102; IF the temperature is above 24°C, THEN adjust the HVAC to cooling; notify the administration that the afternoon school routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningSchoolRoutine, DO monitor the CO2 levels in classroom103; IF the CO2 levels exceed 1200 ppm, THEN increase the ventilation; monitor the light levels in classroom103; IF the light levels are below 200 lux, THEN increase the lighting; monitor the temperature in classroom103; IF the temperature is below 18°C, THEN adjust the HVAC to heating; notify the administration that the evening school routine is completed.
